Module contents¶

Coordinator: AI-powered project management and task coordination system

This module provides a suite of tools for managing software development projects, including task decomposition, RFC generation, and project planning.

Usage:

from coordinator import main

# Run the main coordination process main()

The coordinator can be configured to use different LLM providers (e.g., Ollama, Claude) and supports various project management functions such as task creation, updating, and project summarization.

See the README.md file for more detailed usage instructions and configuration options.

Coordinator
